function.name: SALESFORCE_CREATE_RECORD_CONTACT
function.description:
Triggered when a user wants to Create Contact in Salesforce 
 Returns: an object with the created contact ID and whether the action was successful

function.name: SALESFORCE_SEARCH_RECORDS_CONTACT
function.description:
Triggered when a user wants to Search Contact in Salesforce 
 Returns: an object with an array of contact records

filterFormula.description: Filter search : Search for records that match specified filters. Examples: email, title, description, FirstName, LastName, AccountId

pageCursor.description: The cursor indicating the current page

function.name: SALESFORCE_WRITE_SOQL_QUERY
function.description:
Triggered when a user wants to write an SOQL query or wants to search for Salesforce objects in a structured way. 
 Example: What Salesforce contacts do I have with this email and phone, What Salesforce accounts do I have with name x. 
 Returns: an object with records for the queried Salesforce object

query.description:
SOQL Query (example: "SELECT Id, Name
FROM Account
WHERE Name = 'Ethan'")

function.name: HUBSPOT_CREATE_RECORD_CONTACTS
function.description:
Triggered when a user wants to Create contacts in Hubspot 
 Returns: a hubspot object with the created contact id and properties

hs_v2_cumulative_time_in_marketingqualif.description: Cumulative time in "Marketing Qualified Lead (Lifecycle Stage Pipeline)"

hs_v2_cumulative_time_in_salesqualifiedl.description: Cumulative time in "Sales Qualified Lead (Lifecycle Stage Pipeline)"

hs_v2_date_entered_marketingqualifiedlea.description: Date entered "Marketing Qualified Lead (Lifecycle Stage Pipeline)"

hs_v2_date_entered_salesqualifiedlead.description: Date entered "Sales Qualified Lead (Lifecycle Stage Pipeline)"

hs_v2_date_exited_marketingqualifiedlead.description: Date exited "Marketing Qualified Lead (Lifecycle Stage Pipeline)"

hs_v2_date_exited_salesqualifiedlead.description: Date exited "Sales Qualified Lead (Lifecycle Stage Pipeline)"

hs_v2_latest_time_in_marketingqualifiedl.description: Latest time in "Marketing Qualified Lead (Lifecycle Stage Pipeline)"

hs_v2_latest_time_in_salesqualifiedlead.description: Latest time in "Sales Qualified Lead (Lifecycle Stage Pipeline)"

hs_legal_basis.description: Legal basis for processing contact's data

hs_feedback_show_nps_web_survey.description: Should be shown an NPS web survey

hs_time_between_contact_creation_and_dea.description: Time between contact creation and deal close
Time between contact creation and deal creation

hs_time_to_move_from_lead_to_customer.description: Time to move from lead to customer

hs_time_to_move_from_marketingqualifiedl.description: Time to move from marketing qualified lead to customer

hs_time_to_move_from_opportunity_to_cust.description: Time to move from opportunity to customer

hs_time_to_move_from_salesqualifiedlead_.description: Time to move from sales qualified lead to customer

hs_time_to_move_from_subscriber_to_custo.description: Time to move from subscriber to customer

function.name: HUBSPOT_GET_RECORDS_ANY
function.description:
Triggered when a user wants to Get Any an unknown object typein Hubspot 
 Returns: an array of records with specified Hubspot record type

pageCursor.description: The cursor indicating the current page

function.name: HUBSPOT_SEARCH_RECORDS_CONTACTS
function.description:
Triggered when a user wants to Search contacts in Hubspot. 
 Returns: an array of contact records

filterFormula.description: Filter search : Search for Records that match specified filters. (example: email, firstname, lastname, jobtitle, lifecyclestage)

pageCursor.description: The cursor indicating the current page

function.name: SLACK_LIST_MEMBERS
function.description:
Triggered when a user wants to get all members. 
 Returns: an array of users with their name and Slack ID

function.name: SLACK_SEND_DIRECT_MESSAGE
function.description:
Triggered when a user wants to send direct message. 
 Returns: a confirmation "ok" with the message information

memberId.description: Recipient : Use Connect Portal Workflow Settings to allow users to select a workspace member to DM. Defaults to the authenticated user if not provided. (example: "{{settings.WorkspaceMember}}")

botName.description: Bot name : The name of the bot that sends this message.

botIcon.description: Bot icon : Can be either an image URL or an emoji available to your team (e.g. :dog:)

authenticatedUser.description: Send as authenticated user : If set to true, this message will appear to come from your authenticated Slack user instead of your application. Defaults to false.

function.name: SLACK_SEARCH_MESSAGES
function.description:
Triggered when a user wants to search messages. 
 Returns: an array of message objects with message ID, sender, and message contents

query.description: Search Query : Search for messages that match specified Slack search query. (default is a keyword search; use "in:" followed by a channel, group, or user ID to search within a channel, group, user; use "from:" followed by a user ID or botname to filter by sender)

function.name: SLACK_GET_USER_BY_EMAIL
function.description:
Triggered when a user wants to Get User By Email. 
 Returns: a record with a Slack ID, name, and other profile information

email.description: Email : The email address of a user in the workspace.

function.name: GMAIL_SEND_EMAIL
function.description:
Send a email in Gmail. 
 Returns: the email ID and thread ID

toRecipients.description:
To : Specify the recipients as either a single string or a JSON array. (example: "[
  "recipient1@domain.com",
  "recipient2@domain.com"
]")

from.description: From : Specify the email of the sender.

subject.description: Subject : Specify the subject of the message.

messageContent.description: Message Content : Specify the content of the email message as plain text or HTML.

attachments.description: Attachments : Accepts either a single file object or a JSON array of file objects (example: "[{file object}, {file object}]")

function.name: GMAIL_SEARCH_FOR_EMAIL
function.description:
Search for a email in Gmail by keyword or by additional filters: email from, email to, date, label subject, etc. 
 Returns: an array of messages with message ID and thread ID

emailFilterFormula.description: Search for email based on filter formula. For Example: var1:val1, var2 +val2. Additional filters include: from, to, date, label, subject, cc

function.name: GMAIL_GET_EMAIL_BY_ID
function.description:
Get a email by id in Gmail. 
 Returns: a snippet of the email with attachements and additional data

userId.description: User ID : Specify the user’s email address. (example: "user@domain.com")

messageId.description: Message ID : Specify the ID of the message to retrieve.

function.name: GOOGLE_DRIVE_GET_FILE_BY_ID
function.description:
Get file by Id in Google Drive. 
 Returns a file object with name, mimetype, and binary data if file contents are included and supports binary data download; non-binary files will require exporting

fileId.description: File ID : The ID of the file. (example: "1PVW0QtmQv-829KNvV3DLbYL8WrpS4zhtPx2Ok")

function.name: GOOGLE_DRIVE_LIST_FILES
function.description:
List files in Google Drive. 
 Returns: an array of file objects with mimeType, ID, name and other metadata

parentId.description: Folder : Use Connect Portal Workflow Settings to allow users to select which Folder to get files from. Defaults to the user’s root folder if unspecified. (example: "{{settings.folder}}")

pageSize.description: Page Size : Specify the number of files to include on a page. Accepts values from 1 to 1000. Defaults to 100 if unspecified. (example: "100")

includeSharedItems.description: Include Shared Drive Items : Specify whether search results should include files in shared drives. Defaults to false.

function.name: NOTION_CREATE_PAGE
function.description:
Triggered when a user wants to create a page in Notion. 
Returns: a page object with the ID, URL and other metadata

function.name: NOTION_SEARCH_PAGES
function.description:
Triggered when a user wants to search pages in Notion. 
Returns: an array of block objects with IDs and content

filter.value.description: Filter value. Options include: page, database

function.name: NOTION_GET_PAGE_CONTENT
function.description:
Triggered when a user wants to get a page content in Notion. 
Returns: an array of block objects with block IDs and contents

blockId.description: Page ID : Specify a Block or Page ID to receive all of its block’s children in order. (example: "59833787-2cf9-4fdf-8782-e53db20768a5")
